about_the_game:
Become the envy of every shinobi in the village with this Naruto Uzumaki-styled Seventh Hokage costume!
This costume can be worn by both male and female avatars.

Note: Once downloaded, this content will appear in your Gift Box at the Inn in Hidden Leaf Village.
detailed_description:
Become the envy of every shinobi in the village with this Naruto Uzumaki-styled Seventh Hokage costume!
This costume can be worn by both male and female avatars.

Note: Once downloaded, this content will appear in your Gift Box at the Inn in Hidden Leaf Village.

name: NTBSS: Seventh Hokage Costume (Gender-Neutral)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: Become the envy of every shinobi in the village with this Naruto Uzumaki-styled Seventh Hokage costume! This costume can be worn by both male and female avatars.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
